dcterms:description: A dataset derived from the MNIST handwritten dataset, consisting of images labeled as either 6 or 7, along with their corresponding 180Â°-rotated versions labeled as 9 and 7, respectively.

dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: A collection of natural object images, such as airplanes, dogs, and more, used for image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: CIFAR10

O. Strafforello
R.-J. Bruintjes

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of colored digit images presented in three different colors against a gray background, requiring classification based on both digits and RGB colors.
dcterms:title: ColorMNIST

dcterms:creator: M. Nilsback
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 102 different categories of flowers, with each category containing between 40 and 258 images, used for flower classification tasks.
dcterms:title: Flowers102
